text: Awon arole kan si role leyin won; won jogun Tira (Taorat ati ’Injil), won si n gba (abetele) oore ile aye yii (lati ko ikokuko sinu re), won si n wi pe: “Won yoo forijin wa.” Ti (abetele) oore iru re ba tun wa ba won, won maa gba a. Se A ko ti ba won se adehun ninu Tira pe won ko gbodo se afiti oro kan sodo Allahu afi ododo? Won si ti kekoo nipa ohun ti n be ninu re! Ile ikeyin si loore julo fun awon t’o n beru (Allahu). Se e o nii se laakaye ni
